fx_config.value: Thank you for your business. Please process this invoice within the due date.

Hi {CLIENT}
Thanks for your business inquiry.
The estimate EST {REF} is attached with this email.
Estimate Overview:
Estimate # : EST {REF}
Amount: {CURRENCY} {AMOUNT}
You can view the estimate online at:
{LINK}
Best Regards,
{COMPANY}

Hello {CLIENT}
Here is the invoice of {CURRENCY} {AMOUNT}
You can view the invoice online at:
{LINK}
Best Regards,
{COMPANY}
Looking forward to doing business with you.

Hello {CLIENT}
This is a friendly reminder to pay your invoice of {CURRENCY} {AMOUNT}
You can view the invoice online at:
{LINK}
Best Regards,
{COMPANY}
Freelancer Office is a Web based PHP project management system for Freelancers - buy it on codecanyon

fx_countries.value: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

fx_email_templates.subject: Registration successful
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

New Account

Hi {USERNAME},

Thanks for joining {SITE_NAME}. We listed your sign in details below, make sure you keep them safe.
To open your {SITE_NAME} homepage, please follow this link:
{SITE_NAME} Account

Link doesn't work? Copy the following link to your browser address bar:

{SITE_URL}

Your username: {USERNAME}
Your email address: {EMAIL}
Your password: {PASSWORD}


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: Forgot Password
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

New Password

Forgot your password, huh? No big deal.
To create a new password, just follow this link:
Create new password

Link doesn't work? Copy the following link to your browser address bar:
{PASS_KEY_URL}

You received this email, because it was requested by a {SITE_NAME} user.This is part of the procedure to create a new password on the system. If you DID NOT request a new password then please ignore this email and your password will remain the same.

Thank you,

Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: Change Email
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

Change Email

Hi {NEW_EMAIL},

You have changed your email address for {SITE_NAME}.
Follow this link to confirm your new email address:
Confirm Email

Link doesn't work? Copy the following link to your browser address bar:
{NEW_EMAIL_KEY_URL}

Your email address: {NEW_EMAIL}

You received this email, because it was requested by a {SITE_NAME} user. If you have received this by mistake, please DO NOT click the confirmation link, and simply delete this email. After a short time, the request will be removed from the system.

Thank you,

Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: Activate Account
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

Activate Account

Hi {USERNAME},

Thanks for joining {SITE_NAME}. We listed your sign in details below, make sure you keep them safe. To verify your email address, please follow this link:
Complete Registration

Link doesn't work? Copy the following link to your browser address bar:
{ACTIVATE_URL}
Please verify your email within {ACTIVATION_PERIOD} hours, otherwise your registration will become invalid and you will have to register again.

Your username: {USERNAME}
Your email address: {EMAIL}
Your password: {PASSWORD}


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: Reset Password
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

New Password

Hi {USERNAME},

You have changed your password.
Please, keep it in your records so you don't forget it:
Your username: {USERNAME}
Your email address: {EMAIL}
Your new password: {NEW_PASSWORD}


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: New Bug Assigned
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

Bug assigned

Hi there,

A new bug {ISSUE_TITLE} has been assigned to you by {ASSIGNED_BY} in project {PROJECT_TITLE}.
You can view this bug by logging in to the portal using the link below:
View Dashboard


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: Bug status changed
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

Bug status changed

Hi There,

Bug {ISSUE_TITLE} has been marked as {STATUS} by {MARKED_BY}.
You can view this bug by logging in to the portal using the link below:
View Dashboard


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: New Bug Comment Received
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

New comment received

Hi There,

A new comment has been posted by {POSTED_BY} to bug {ISSUE_TITLE}.
You can view the comment using the link below:
View Dashboard

{COMMENT_MESSAGE}

Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

New Upload

Hi There,

A new file has been uploaded by {UPLOADED_BY} to issue {ISSUE_TITLE}.
You can view the bug using the link below.:

Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.template_body:

You can view the Bug using the Dashboard Page.:

fx_email_templates.subject: Project Completed
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

Project Completed

Hi {CLIENT_NAME},

Project : {PROJECT_TITLE} - {PROJECT_CODE} has been completed.
You can view the project by logging into your portal Account:
View Dashboard

Hours Logged # : {PROJECT_HOURS} hours
Project Cost : {PROJECT_COST}

Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: Payment Received
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

Invoice {REF} Payment

Dear Customer,

We have received your payment of {INVOICE_CURRENCY} {PAID_AMOUNT}.
Thank you for your Payment and business. We look forward to working with you again.
--------------------------


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: New Ticket [TICKET_CODE]
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

New Ticket

Hi {USER_EMAIL},

Ticket #{TICKET_CODE} has been created by the client.
You may view the ticket by clicking on the following link:
Client Email : {REPORTER_EMAIL}

View Ticket


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: Ticket [TICKET_CODE] Opened
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

Ticket Opened

Hi {CLIENT_EMAIL},

Your ticket has been opened with us.
Ticket #{TICKET_CODE}
Status : Open
Click on the below link to see the ticket details and post replies:
View Ticket


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: Ticket [TICKET_CODE] Response
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

Ticket Response

Hi There,

A new response has been added to Ticket #{TICKET_CODE}

Ticket : #{TICKET_CODE}
Status : {TICKET_STATUS}
{TICKET_REPLY}
To see the response and post additional comments, click on the link below:
View Ticket


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: Ticket [TICKET_CODE] Closed
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

Ticket Closed

Hi {REPORTER_EMAIL},

Ticket #{TICKET_CODE} has been closed by {STAFF_USERNAME}
Ticket : #{TICKET_CODE}
Status : {TICKET_STATUS}
Replies : {NO_OF_REPLIES}
To see the responses or open the ticket, click on the link below:
View Ticket


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}

fx_email_templates.subject: Ticket Auto Closed
fx_email_templates.template_body:
{INVOICE_LOGO}
 

Ticket Closed

Hi {REPORTER_EMAIL},

Ticket #{TICKET_CODE} has been auto closed due to inactivity.

Ticket : #{TICKET_CODE}
Status : {TICKET_STATUS}
To see the responses or open the ticket, click on the link below:
View Ticket


Best Regards,
{SITE_NAME}
 
 
{SIGNATURE}
